overview: A high school boy interested in serial killers suspects his reclusive neighbor is going around murdering teenage boys. According to the video box "This movie contains graphic images of stragulation, implied perverted sexual situations including masturbation obsession, sodomy, necrophilia, foot fetish and also contains brief nudity."
tagline: One of the most disturbing, shocking and controversial movies you'll ever see!
title: The Masked Strangler
